node.html:
• Working on the in-house risk, pricing and trade management platform of JP Morgan.
  • Working on state-of-the-art data analytics dashboards for efficient agile development
  • Worked on technical solutions for the financial workings of the company to make sure the cash flows ran smoothly
  • Utilizing technologies like Python, Java, Spring and tests using jUnit, Mockito and Fitnesse

• AccioJob provides a 6-month Full Stack Web Development Training Programme
  • Mentoring 100+ students and early professionals in web development (MERN Stack)
  • Impacting the Indian work force by providing good and efficient talent, by helping candidates with a strong start or a career switch

• Contributed to the Product Development Space of Softway by collaborating with multiple agile teams
  • Set standards between different teams and created a suite of products with a robust authentication system for SSO and non-SSO users
  • Created features using NodeJS, ReactJS, AWS services like Cognito, Lambda, S3, API Gateway, App sync

• Project Lead for a calendar appointment application
  • Utilizing technologies like MongoDB, ReactJS, and NodeJS
  • Integrating APIs like Full Calendar
  • A product that can be used internally by the company and or rolled out as a stand-alone product

• Spearheaded the development of a new Learning Management System (LMS) in an EdTech company
  • Worked with technologies like React, Redux, NodeJS, Send Mail Grid APIs
  • Building a combination of LMS and CRM (Customer Relationship Management) for fluent interaction between students and content creators

• Spearheaded the product development as a technical team leader in a Food & Beverage industry start-up
  • Designed a virtual community for restaurant owners
  • Worked on technologies like NodeJS, MySQL, S3, Socket IO
